fixes.name: MUSH Delta Down T CAD
fixes.dax_expression: IF('Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[CURRENCY] = "CAD", 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T CAD], 0)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau row-level IF to DAX IF. All column references were mapped to 'TableName'[ColumnName] format and the calculated field [Delta Down T CAD] is referenced as a column on the same table.
